net.derquinse.bocas.je
Class JEBocasBuilder

java.lang.Object
  net.derquinse.bocas.je.JEBocasBuilder

public final class JEBocasBuilder
extends Object

Builder class for Bocas buckets based on Berkeley DB Java Edition.

Author:
Andres Rodriguez.
